traits.appearance: wears distinctive jewelry: earrings, necklace, circlet, bracelets
traits.abilities: is persuasive, forceful, and a born leader, but is dim-witted and slow

personality.mannerism: Makes terrible, forced puns, and stops talking until someone acknowledges it
personality.interaction: is rude to just one member of the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Slowly, at a High pitch.
voice.quirk: Responds in the form of questions
